abstract: Driven column review of the Ford Edge.
lead_paragraph: The midsize crossover category has gotten smaller with the discontinuation of the Honda Crosstour and Toyota Venza, but the new Edge remains a strong entry.

headline.main: Video Review: The Ford Edge Adds a Touch of Luxury
headline.print_headline: The Ford Edge Adds a Touch of Luxury

snippet: The midsize crossover category has gotten smaller with the discontinuation of the Honda Crosstour and Toyota Venza, but the new Edge remains a strong entry.
